Title: Understanding the Concept of Product Hijacking
Content: Product hijacking involves leveraging the product selection and content creation abilities of successful competitors and merchants. By monitoring their new product launches and content, you can quickly identify high-performing items and replicate their success. This strategy requires speed and vigilance to stay ahead of other competitors.

Title: Identifying Successful Competitors and Merchants
Content: To effectively hijack products, you need to identify successful competitors and merchants on platforms like Douyin. Monitor their accounts to see which new products and content formats are performing well. Focus on those with consistently high engagement and sales across multiple products, as they are more likely to have a reliable strategy.

Title: Methods for Monitoring Competitors
Content: Use tools like KaoGuJia to find trending products and related influencers. Manually search and follow top-performing merchants and competitors on Douyin, setting up notifications for their new posts. Additionally, use Douyin's Creative Center to track trending content in real-time, focusing on the past hour or 24 hours for the most up-to-date information.

Title: Applying Hijacking Strategies to Other Platforms
Content: The hijacking strategy can be applied to other platforms like Xiaohongshu, Pinduoduo, and Taobao. On Xiaohongshu, monitor popular posts and replicate successful content formats. For Pinduoduo and Taobao, focus on merchants with original product offerings and regularly check their new listings for potential high-performing items.

Title: Analyzing Non-Linked Popular Products on Xiaohongshu
Content: Pay attention to popular products on Xiaohongshu that do not have direct purchase links. Analyze why these posts are successful by looking at likes, comments, and shares. Consider whether you can source and sell similar products, and replicate the content format to achieve similar success.

Title: Developing a Commercial Mindset
Content: Adopt a commercial mindset when browsing Xiaohongshu. Always think about whether a popular product or content format can be replicated for your own use. Spend at least an hour daily on Xiaohongshu to stay updated on trends and focus on monitoring potential high-performing products rather than consuming entertainment content.
